p2: Parser yang mengextract browser, OS, device, dan informasi lain dari user agent string. Paste user agent string dan tool menganalisis untuk identify browser version, operating system, mobile/desktop classification. Berguna untuk troubleshooting browser compatibility, analytics, dan security investigation. Support modern dan legacy browser.
p3: Web developer menggunakan parser untuk debug browser compatibility issue dengan client reported. Analytics engineer menggunakan untuk parse user agent dalam log untuk audience demographic. Security team menggunakan untuk analyze suspicious user agent dan detect bot/crawler. QA tester menggunakan untuk verify site rendering consistent di different browser reported user.
p4: User agent string dapat falsified (spoofed) sehingga jangan rely untuk critical security decision. Gunakan user agent untuk analytics dan client hint untuk technical capability detection lebih reliable. Modern browser recommend gunakan Client Hints header yang standardized daripada parse user agent string. Analyze user agent tren untuk understand user base dan platform priority untuk development focus.
p5: The parser uses regular expressions to extract key components from the User-Agent string format. Browser detection patterns match known signatures for Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, Opera, and others. Operating system identification covers Windows, macOS, Linux, iOS, Android, and ChromeOS. Version numbers are extracted using numeric pattern matching after browser identifiers. Device type is inferred from keywords like "Mobile", "Tablet", or "iPad" in the string. Engine detection identifies Blink, Gecko, WebKit, and Trident rendering engines based on standard UA conventions.
